name: smanos

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smanos
des:
With the smanos skill, you are able to control your alarm system and camera using your voice.
With the skill you can:
“Alexa, ask smanos to arm away”
“Alexa, ask smanos to arm stay”
“Alexa, ask smanos to disarm”
“Alexa, ask smanos to record video”
“Alexa, ask smanos to turn on Privacy Mode”
“Alexa, ask smanos to turn off Privacy Mode”
 and more to come...

Where does smanos come in? smanos is a smart home technology brand developed by a score of perfectionists obsessed with one-touch human-machine interactions and simple, secure living. With smanos, you get to enjoy – in style – complete control, comfort, convenience and visual confirmation of your smart home right at your fingertips. Simply put, smanos helps ensure you live life to the fullest, worry-free. 
smanos is the embodiment of security, monitoring and automation capabilities in simplistic, elegant packages. For more smanos sensations, please check out smanos.com.
